channel.title: Funpk help
channel.description:
could anyone please explain me how to make a funpk area or give me a tutorial on it?
THANK YOU! :)

item.title: Funpk help
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

JC made a tutorial a lonnnnnnnnnnnnnnng time ago, use the search button.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,436259.msg3205040.html (Anything else)
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484175.msg3547343.html (PI)

took less than a minute to find…

Also, I don’t even suggest you use that method, not trying to toot my own horn but it would be better to just use my region system, than classify each constant as each safe or dangerous.

Nvm you won’t be able to do that it so just use JC’s tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Funpk help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You need a boolean or something to check that you are in a fun pk zone. Then you need to allow combat (pick if it’s multi or not) in the region, like pvp. From there you need to make sure when your characters die, they don’t lose items.
Would be a bonus to make them spawn near the funpk zone

Read full topic
